definition: erhua variant of 奶嘴[nai3 zui3]

sentences.english: Give no artificial teats or pacifiers (also called dummies or soothers) to breastfeeding infants.
sentences.chinese: 對母乳餵養的嬰兒不要使用人工奶嘴或橡皮奶頭。

sentences.english: This top fits over the bottle and keeps the teat sterile .
sentences.chinese: 這個蓋子嚴實地蓋在奶瓶上，保持奶嘴無菌。

sentences.english: They sometimes have different "flow rates, " which correspond to the size of the nipple's hole.
sentences.chinese: 有時他們有不同的流量，這取決於奶嘴上孔的大小。
需要幫忙來戒掉寶寶的奶嘴嗎？

sentences.english: Wash floors, windowsills, hands, toys, and pacifiers often.
sentences.chinese: 清洗地板，窗臺邊，雙手，玩具，奶嘴常。

sentences.english: When the time comes to wean your child from the pacifier, do it gradually.
sentences.chinese: 如果到了給你的孩子戒奶嘴的時候，請慢着性子來。

sentences.english: But Mom decided soother was a choking hazard.
sentences.chinese: 但媽媽卻認定奶嘴有讓我窒息的危險。

sentences.english: Female striped hyenas have six teats , brown hyena have four.
sentences.chinese: 母條紋鬣狗有六個橡皮奶嘴，褐色土有四個。

sentences.english: Where has selling the rubber nipple not needing whorl cover?
sentences.chinese: 哪裏有賣不需要旋蓋的橡膠奶嘴？

sentences.english: She took soother to the basement and chucked11) it into the wood furnace12).
sentences.chinese: 她把安撫奶嘴拿到地下室，扔到燒木柴的爐子裏。

sentences.english: Mrs. Arable found a baby's nursing bottle and a rubber nipple.
sentences.chinese: 阿瑞博太太找到了一個嬰兒奶瓶和一個橡膠奶嘴。

sentences.english: In addition, you give children pacifiers check whether patency .
sentences.chinese: 另外，你要給孩子檢查一下奶嘴，是否通暢。

sentences.english: Inspect before each se and pull the feeding teat in all directions.
sentences.chinese: 每次使用前進行檢查，向各個方向拉動奶嘴。

sentences.english: The third stage is the simple replacement of the nipple with the No-Spill silicone spout.
sentences.chinese: 第三階段，只要簡單的把奶嘴換成鴨嘴吸嘴即可。

sentences.english: Love these nipples, not too fast, not too slow.
sentences.chinese: 愛這些奶嘴，不太快，也不太慢。

definition: to suckle/to pump breast milk with a breast pump
erhua variant of 奶嘴[nai3 zui3]
